name: Shadows of Zana
storyline:
Shortly after The Prince returned home safely and The Queen was changed back to her original form, trouble has once again fallen upon King Joy. The Queen has gone missing and The Color of the kingdom has been stolen! Is the Phantom of Zana up to something once again? Or has a new scallywag hit the scene?

Play as Fantastic Fania once again and unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of The Color and The Queen.
summary: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through the Sequel of Phantom of Zana. Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania and bring The Color back to Zana in this retro inspired 2D Action Platformer.
